original_text: but Moses alone is to approach the Lord; the others must not come near. And the people may not come up with him.”
korean_text: 너 모세만 여호와께 가까이 나아오고 그들은 가까이 나아오지 말며 백성은 너와 함께 올라오지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: but Moses alone is to approach the Lord
the others must not come near
And the people may not come up with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 백성은 그와 함께 올라올 수 없다
